rating_comment: decent stay and a good host

the place was good, but it is not recommended for 4 people, it has one double bed only, the other bed is for single person only so it is good for 3 people, the place is 1 bhk type and the location is also not that convenient for airport travel because you will not get uber, you can take tuk tuk from outside.

One of the best place to hangout and have the home cooked food in a fine residential area…. Just a kind request for you sir to have a personal transportation facility …. !!!
A family away family…. The host is very much involved in making your stay comfortable and pleasant.

The place is very clean, with lots of sunlight and air. Exactly as mentioned in the listing. It's very close to the highway, so it's perfect for those who are travelling by road or to and from the airport. There are lots of veg and non-veg restaurants about 5 minutes away by foot. Swiggy delivers here as well. There are many grocery stores nearby. The host has provided bowls for pets. There is no dedicated parking available but there is enough space on the road in front of the house to park two cars.
The only thing is that there is a leaky tap in the bathroom. The dripping sound makes it difficult to sleep in the adjoining room. Also, there are no hooks for hang clothes inside and the rod on the wall is not enough.
Otherwise, all the amenities are great. Lastly, Rishi 's father coordinated with us throughout and was very responsive and polite. We stayed only for a few hours but liked the place. Overall, a good place at a reasonable price for a short stay.
Had a pleasant stay. The host was very accommodating and proactive. The place was neat and was sufficient for 4 of us. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful.

It was a nice place to stay for our family. Also, we travelled with our two dogs and the owner was very accommodating to our dogs as well as Mr. Sarkar was very proactive and helpful. Definitely recommended for other families as well and will book this place again when I visit Siliguri.

I had a great experience. The accommodation was comfortable, the location convenient, and the host was welcoming. The overall cleanliness and amenities met my expectations, making for a pleasant stay. I would recommend this Airbnb to others looking for a reliable and comfortable place to stay.
Had a wonderful, homely stay in the bnb. Thank you for having us!
Rishi and his dad were very helpful and communicated well. Would recommend.
The location was not correct. I was asked by his father to reach some other location
Accommodation is very clean and it is as described. Rishi and his Father are very helpful and have guided us at times in need, this place is the best

Mr. Ashish sarkar/the host was extremely welcoming and made sure we had everything we needed during our stay. The apartment itself was beautifully decorated and very clean. It had all the amenities we could ask for, including a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable beds, and a spacious living area.

Nice place. Hosts were really friendly and kind.
Exact location: Leninpur, Bairatisal, near Mahakal sweets, 3rd right lane after that.

the place is very clean, quiet, and private... host is very friendly and helpful... we planned to check in in the evening but couldn't and checked in pretty late at night, but Mr Ashok sarkar father of host rishiraj was there waiting for us... it's a nice place....
About how to reach this place:
Take a electric vehicle ( toto) / auto to shiv mandir from njp station and then take another from shiv mandir to leninpur fare ₹ 10 per person...
Rooms are clean. Things specially furnitures are more good in quality as the owner described. Specially they are very friendly.
